CustomField.description: Annual compliance check by Revenue Services to confirm there are no outstanding taxes, water rates, or other sums owed to the City with respect to the property.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Annual compliance check by Revenue Services to confirm there are no outstanding taxes, water rates, or other sums owed to the City with respect to the property.(attach Tax/Utility Certificates)
CustomField.label: No Outstanding Property Taxes
